package app;******************************************

import java.util.Locale;
import java.util.Scanner;

import entities.Rectangule;

public class Produto {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		Locale.setDefault(Locale.US);
		
		Rectangule rec = new Rectangule();
		
		
		System.out.println("Ënter rectangule width and height:");
		rec.width=sc.nextDouble();
		rec.height=sc.nextDouble();
		
		System.out.println(rec);

		
	
	
	
		sc.close();




package entities;package entities;

public class Rectangule {


	public double width;
	public double height;
	
	
	public double Area() {
		return width*height;
	}
	
	public double Perimeter() {
		return 2*(width+height);
	}
     
	public double Diagonal() {
		return Math.sqrt(width*width+height*height);
	}

	public String toString() {
		return String.format("AREA:"+Area()+"%nPERIMETER:"+Perimeter()+"%nDIAGONAL:"+Diagonal());
	}
	
	
}

public class Rectangule {


	public double width;
	public double height;
	
	
	public double Area() {
		return width*height;
	}
	
	public double Perimeter() {
		return 2*(width+height);
	}
     
	public double Diagonal() {
		return Math.sqrt(width*width+height*height);
	}

	public String toString() {
		return String.format("AREA:"+Area()+"%nPERIMETER:"+Perimeter()+"%nDIAGONAL:"+Diagonal());
	}
	
	
}




package entities;*********************************************

public class Rectangule {


	public double width;
	public double height;
	
	
	public double Area() {
		return width*height;
	}
	
	public double Perimeter() {
		return 2*(width+height);
	}
     
	public double Diagonal() {
		return Math.sqrt(width*width+height*height);
	}

	public String toString() {
		return String.format("AREA:"+Area()+"%nPERIMETER:"+Perimeter()+"%nDIAGONAL:"+Diagonal());
	}
	
	
}
